tswitem.name: Signet of Divine Inspiration
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Divine Inspiration
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you apply a barrier effect to an ally, that ally gains a beneficial effect which increases damage dealt by 4%/8%/12% for 10 seconds. This effect is removed when the barrier effect is removed from that ally. This Signet can be attached to Head Talismans or Weapons. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
